sub_topic: Prove that the empty set is a subset of every set.
message_1: Let A = {2, 4, 6, 8} and B = {1, 3, 5}. Determine whether or not the empty set is a subset of each of these sets.
message_2: The empty set, denoted as âˆ…, is a subset of every set, including sets A and B. This is because the empty set does not contain any elements, so all of its elements (which are none) are also in any other set. Therefore, the empty set is a subset of both A and B.
